Joshua Scott Jones

One half of country duo Steel Magnolia

  • Live Music

  • Guitarist

  • Singer

  • Entertainer

Born in Houston

But raised by an adoptive family in rural Illinois, his father was a factory worker on weekdays and a minister on Sundays.

Country Rock

At home Josh heard his folks' classic country music and his older brother's rock and roll explorations.

The rest came at church

My family ended up going to an all black church called Second Baptist when I was 13, so I got immersed in the stomp.
